TEXT.English: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.French: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.German: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.Italian: %s1_CivName stanno provando a formare una loro nazione. Cosa dobbiamo fare?
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.Russian: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?

TEXT.English: Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire. (rely on stability only %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.French: Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire. (rely on stability only %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.German: Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire. (rely on stability only %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Italian: Ignorali, nessuno vorrà davvero abbandonare il nostro potente Impero. (dipende dalla stabilità, solo il %d1_RawOdds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire. (rely on stability only %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Russian: Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire. (rely on stability only %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels)

TEXT.English: Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebells. (rely on number of units in the cities, generates unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.French: Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebells. (rely on number of units in the cities, generates unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.German: Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebells. (rely on number of units in the cities, generates unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Italian: Sopprimi la rivolta. (dipende dal numero di unità presenti nelle tue città, genera infelicità e causa un turno di rivolta, %d1_Odds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebells. (rely on number of units in the cities, generates unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Russian: Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebells. (rely on number of units in the cities, generates unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)

TEXT.English: Bribe the local Lords, the rebells have no chance without their support. (rely on your government civic, pay %d1_Gold, %d2_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.French: Bribe the local Lords, the rebells have no chance without their support. (rely on your government civic, pay %d1_Gold, %d2_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.German: Bribe the local Lords, the rebells have no chance without their support. (rely on your government civic, pay %d1_Gold, %d2_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Italian: Corrompi l'aristocrazia locale, i ribelli non hanno possibilità di sopravvivere senza il loro supporto. (dipende dalla tua forma di governo, paga %d1_Gold, %d2_Odds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: Bribe the local Lords, the rebells have no chance without their support. (rely on your government civic, pay %d1_Gold, %d2_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Russian: Bribe the local Lords, the rebells have no chance without their support. (rely on your government civic, pay %d1_Gold, %d2_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)

TEXT.English: Do whatever it takes to keep them. (combine all of the above options, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.French: Do whatever it takes to keep them. (combine all of the above options, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.German: Do whatever it takes to keep them. (combine all of the above options, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Italian: Fai qualunque cosa per fermarli. (combina tutte le opzioni di sopra, %d1_Odds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: Do whatever it takes to keep them. (combine all of the above options, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
TEXT.Russian: Do whatever it takes to keep them. (combine all of the above options, %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels)
